text: The Heath bar is a candy bar made of toffee, almonds, and milk chocolate. It was first manufactured by the Heath Brothers Confectionery in 1928, in Robinson, Illinois. It has been manufactured and distributed by Hershey since its acquisition of the Leaf International North American confectionery operations late in 1996. It continues to be manufactured at the HeatH candy factory in Robinson, Illinois. In addition to the Heath bar, the plant also manufactures the Skor bar, Milk Duds, and Paydays. There is a museum, located on the town Square in Robinson, dedicated to the history of the Heath factory. Category:Chocolate bars
title: Heath bar
